data.text:
Sauk City: Arkham House, 1949. Very Good / Very Good. Item #10084

Sauk City: Arkham House, 1949. First Edition. Octavo; viii, 186pp. 3062 copies printed (3000 stated on colophon at back). Original dust jacket with $3.00 price intact; book in Holliston Black Novelex cloth with gilt lettering to spine. Jacket a bit scuffed along folds and at spine ends, but crisp with no chips or tears. Boards are square, with some rubbing and exposure along top edge, nudging to spine ends, and some very light abrasions at bottom back. Glue toning along gutter of last page and tipped-in colophon, with a patch of light smudging on final page but all text legible. Binding is sound and pages unmarked.

Collection of thematically-linked short science fiction stories, but the author of The World Below and Deluge.

[Joshi 42].
